Well, you seemed to be doing well when you were busy all day. My suggestion would be to go back to that, filling your time with meaningful activities/hobbies.
If anything, continuing to have sex should make it easier to handle the urges.
I was about to write a long ass comment about why your wrong. Luckily I didn't have to.

Here's an article that should help: https://blogs.scientificamerican.com/scicurious-brain/sleep-deprived-mind-your-dopamine/
If you were to work our right before bed you'd have trouble falling asleep. PMO before bed works the same way, raising your wakefulness making it harder to sleep.

Well, he could be putting pressure on him because he wants his son to succeed, be healthier, etc. I'm not saying destroying his phone was right (doesn't really accomplish anything), but his father could be acting on good intentions, not being abusive.
Your words are poetry in motion.
Yup, getting some fresh air and exercise is great.
Better to bring these things to light rather than try and hide them.
He didn't say life gets worse. He said he still has a lot of time left.

I know exactly what your going through. I'm in a similar position myself; I have no real, close friends, and I feel lonely and depressed. I just relapsed yesterday too, and I hated myself for failing again, hated myself for what I was. Everything seems so black, bleak and grey and meaningless.
But I have hope that things will get better. Even though I haven't seen the light, I have seen glimpses of it in my life. I little something here, a little something there, enough to convince me that I can get out of this place, can achieve my goals and dreams. So please, have hope. I know it sounds stupid and cliche, but my experience has showed me that there is hope, there is a way out, there is a meaning to living. There are people out there who care about you, this community included.
Yup, had that happen to me too.
Not if anything to say about I have.
Not sure why we all have this fascination with boxers.....
Briefs might crush your balls, but not boxer briefs. I'm not sure why you think tighter=more boners. If anything, it's the opposite.
You get the best of both worlds, comfort and stability.
Cold showers and/or ice pack on groin can help.
How bout boxer-briefs!

Just read it, I'm happy for you. Best of luck here on out!

I'm also in a low-energy, depressed state right now. Its sucks, but I feel better knowing others are having a similar experience. Right now I'm going to do everything to not wallow in grief but fight these negative feelings through sweat and blood.

WRITING.TITLE: 90 Day Streak, I'm a Sex God
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm banging 9s and 10s like its nothing and they just keep coming back for more! Godlike superpowers await us all!
April Fools. But seriously, the benefits are there. Don't be a fool, and stay PMO free this month.

I agree with you, some people take this way to far, even abstaining from sex because they consider it a relapse. And I also agree that just abstaining from PMO is not *the* reason he got laid. But NoFap is a lifestyle change that goes beyond not fapping, and these other changes are what presumably helped him get laid. That said, there are benefits to not fapping, and this no doubt helped him get where he is now.
So you've done NoFap for 6 months and nothing happened?
